title: (PopupHeader Problem!) Client window bugged. Need help :O
body:
I just tried to log in and the window popped up for  the new beta (or alpha idk) client. But i can't go on since the window is bugged. It says popuptitle and popupheader and I can't close or accept this window. I tried uninstalling, reinstalling,restarting my pc, using the Hextech Repair tool but none of this was able to help me solving this problem . 

Did anyone Experience this yet and if you did, how did you solve it? 

Thanks{{item:3070}} 

Here is the client:
[](http://pictub.club/image/KqnOW)

replies.body:
I appreciate the detailed info on this, and even stranger than the formatting errors is that you can't even close out of it.  After some theorizing, I'd like you to try something out!  I'm guessing here that the formatting window might be a result of the client trying to provide you with some piece of news or information.  I could be wrong, but it's worth a shot.  Out of curiosity, is this your first time logging in since the preseason patch?  

I'd like you to try going to back to the legacy patcher to see if you'll instead receive a message there.  You can return to the legacy client under the Sign In button of the updated client, or manually through your League of Legends folder -> lol.launcher.

Let me know if that helps.
I am having the same issue and can not find a solution.
Currently suffering this exact same issue. This is not the updated client, this is the default client.

Same issue. Popup is unresponsive and first time logging in since new client patch. 

It appears to be an information window regarding the beta client as one item is {{betaFAQ}}.

I have un-installed, rebooted, launched from shortcut, launched from lol.launcher and lol.launcher.admin but nothing works. Same thing happens when the client starts with each one and this popup blocks the screen and you cannot close it.
